body:
Comment 1: 
I'd like to debug the 6l crash but it's difficult given
the lack of backtrace information.  You ran gdb make core
but I think you should run gdb 6l core.
Unfortunately you rebuilt 6l since then you'll have to
re-provoke the crash.

I fixed the makefiles to fix the problem you mentioned
with the cannot touch _obj/_cgo_run.

Russ
